bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Louis L. Williams, Jr., May 5, 1948

div1.p: Hench discusses efforts to discover the date and circumstances of the Americans' visit to Finlay to acquire mosquitoes for research use. To this end, he requests permission to borrow Carter's book of Finlay's collected works that contains a marginal note on this subject.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Louis L. Williams, Jr., May 5, 1948
div1.opener:
May 5, 1948
Dr. Louis L. Williams
Medical Director
Federal Security Agency
U. S. Public Health Service
Washington 14, D. C.
My dear Doctor Williams:
div1.p:
I appreciate greatly your letter of April 21 and am much interested
in what you say. I have just returned from a visit to Cuba. We are trying
to preserve the remains of Camp Lazear and the Cuban Government, at my request,
has set aside $50,000 as a preliminary amount for its preservation. One of the
points I have discussed with Cuban friends was the supposed date when Finlay
gave the Americans the mosquitoes. Apparently Reed went with Lazear to visit
Finlay on or about August 1 but I too found the note on page 11 of the “Selected
Works of Finlay” in which Finlay mentions Lazear's visit of June.

In the presidential palace there has been unveiled a painting memorializing
this visit of the Americans to Finlay. I have had some argument with the
painter as to who should be in the painting. I would be delighted indeed
if you would lend me this book as I should like to make a photostatic copy
of Doctor Carter's marginal note. Doctor Carter's son and nephew have very
kindly loaned me a trunkful of Doctor' Carter's letters and pamphlets which
I am going through now. If you prefer not to send me the book, I would
appreciate it greatly if you would have a local photographic firm make a
photograph or photostatic copy of this one page with Doctor Carter's marginal
note. But if the book contains various notes by Doctor Guiteras, I should
appreciate the loan of the book.
div1.closer: Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:alc
